title: The Growth of flowers
brief_description: A series of time-lapse studies of roses, orchids, viruses, jack-in-pulpits, and daffodils, as their buds grow and swell and the flower opens out from the bud.
description: A series of time-lapse studies of roses, orchids, viruses, jack-in-pulpits, and daffodils, as their buds grow and swell and the flower opens out from the bud.
